name: Robotfriend
description:
While on a dangerous mission, your robot's locomotion system broke! You'll need to protect your robot friend while it repairs itself.

Fetch and give to your robot batteries. They are necessary to maintain its shield, or boost his abilities. 

Batteries

There are three types of battery.

  • Blue: increase shields.
  • Yellow: Improves rate of fire for a short amount of time.
  • Red: Activates super weapon for a short amount of time.
Controls
  • Left click while close to a battery to pick it up.
  • Left click while close to robot to give battery.
  • Press space to dash.
